div.h1:
Welcome To Your New
Medical Home

div.p: Welcome to your health and wellness center! The center is your source for your convenient, high-quality primary care and wellness services provided to eligible members FREE OF CHARGE. Please schedule a visit for any of your healthcare needs!

div.class: et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_1 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty

div.h1: What Our Members Have To Say

div.script: jQuery(document).ready(function() { jQuery(".testimonial_slider_fouc .testimonial_slider_set").show(); });jQuery(document).ready(function() {jQuery("head").append("");});jQuery(document).ready(function() { jQuery("#testimonial_slider_recent").testiMonial({ responsive: true, items: { width: 300, visible : { min: 1, max: 3} }, auto: 2000, scroll: { items:2, fx: "scroll", easing: "swing", duration: 600, pauseOnHover: true } }); jQuery("head").append(""); jQuery("#testimonial_slider_recent_wrap").hover( function() { jQuery(this).find(".testimonial_nav_arrow_wrap").show();}, function() { jQuery(this).find(".testimonial_nav_arrow_wrap").hide();} ); jQuery("#testimonial_slider_recent").touchwipe({ wipeLeft: function() { jQuery("#testimonial_slider_recent").trigger("next", 1); }, wipeRight: function() { jQuery("#testimonial_slider_recent").trigger("prev", 1); }, preventDefaultEvents: false }); });

p.strong: This page has a slideshow that uses Javascript. Your browser either doesn't support Javascript or you have it turned off. To see this page as it is meant to appear please use a Javascript enabled browser.

span.p: I can't believe how wonderful this clinic is. And it's all free! They are very professional, and always answer my questions fully. The entire staff is great.

This is the first clinic I have been to that everyone was friendly; I actually like it a lot better than my original doctors office. A lot cleaner and seems to explain more to me and ask more questions so that I understand and feel better when leaving. ...
They are always VERY thorough, efficient and friendly - this is an unbeatable combination. This is a tremendous resource for employees to have.
They were able to get me in without an appointment. Very satisfied with the visit and follow up.
I love this clinic. I trust the provider, and he is very friendly, and patient (even with my young children). I would choose the Wellness for Life Clinic before my family doctor every time.
The nurse practitioner and staff treated me better than my doctors office of 30 years.
I went with my son. I did not have an appointment but I had symptoms and the staff was so accommodating and fit me into their schedule. I am so glad they did! They were awesome.
I feel so blessed to have a wonder clinic to go to and the staff are amazing. They care I'm not just a number!!!

I was early for appointment and they seen me right away. I was feeling awful and doc took her time with me. Explained everything. She made me feel like I was important. The other workers were friendly and explained how I would feel after breathing treatment and how ...
Provider is very friendly and knowledgeable. Easy to make an appointment and be seen promptly. I appreciate that the visits are not rushed.
Such a great staff! They worked us in when they didn't have an opening! Thank you!
The reason for my visit was somewhat emergent. The staff encouraged me to come right in and treated me quickly, with respect and efficiency. I highly recommend all that staff!
Always get appt quickly, staff is always very friendly, helpful. Much faster and friendlier than my Dr's office.

I don't know what my husband and I would do without this facility. I provides us with great care and the best staff ever. My husband uses the clinic several times a year for blood work. He loves all of the staff there. It is a wonderful asset.
I was in and out quickly for a blood draw and meds. It took me longer to drive there!!!! Staff is great!

The clinic has gone above and beyond what I have experienced elsewhere. I was seen same day and also received my xray same day to an outside clinic. Everyone in the clinic is professional and ready to answer any questions. They always have a smile for you. thanks ...
Great overall experience! I was in (including filling out the paperwork) and out in under 20 minutes with free medication to take care of my cough. Outstanding!

I LOVE THE NEW CLINIC!It is run so much more professionally. They always seems to have “same-day-appointments” or work you in for things that crop up and need attention.They are efficient but best of all – they do not make you wait in the exam room for 30 ...
I am so thankful for the Covington clinic. The staff is extremely helpful and friendly. Wish all Dr. office's would follow suit! Definitely spoiled by the quality of care here.
SUPER accommodating today to get me in to be seen, friendly and reassuring that I wasn't a problem needing a last minute appointment.
Love being able to get in any time I need, I can always count on them for anything! It's awesome to not have to worry about spending tons of money to go to the immediate care!

During a routine visit for a cold & cough, suggested an EKG be done, due to shortness of breath. After the EKG, I then went on to have a Heart Cath, and am scheduled for triple bypass surgery. Am so thankful for all the staff and grateful that ...

I've learned so much from the excellent staff at the WFL clinic. Lab work goes into more detail than any previous doc ever did, and the NP is phenomenal. Very pleased with the support and detailed info that I've received, and I'm now looking forward to working with the ...
They are the best!!! I appreciate them so much. Wish all people were like them. What a wonderful world it would be!
My visit saved me from a trip to the ER!

div.p:
Our purpose at Proactive MD is to provide our patients with
unparalleled quality of care, incorporate technology to improve
overall health, create transparent pricing and provide open access to
your Provider at YOUR convenience.

div.p:
As a valued member, you have unlimited access to the following services –
with no co-pays, and no additional out-of-pocket expenses

div.p:
To Schedule an Appointment, call: 888-862-9525
Fax: 765-736-0186
Email: covington@healthcare-redefined.com
Website: http://covington.healthcare-redefined.com
Please use this hotline only for your urgent needs when your clinic is closed. If it is during regular health hours, Please call your clinic directly.

span.strong: If you or a family member is exhibiting respiratory symptoms, or if you suspect a possible exposure to COVID-19, p

strong.a:
lease call our Task Force Hotline at
1-844-784-2900 right away.
